description: Enhancing women's roles and participation in local governance by making Governance gender responsive.

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: Enabling environment for women Panchayati Raj Institutions, Empowerment of community women to demand their rights and entitlements from the local government and Advocacy and Alliance building.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Role of Women in Local Governa
